subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: The suspended Pacman Jones settled his last pending criminal charge, pleading no contest to obstructing a police officer two years ago. Jones’s lawyer and agent, Manny Arora, said Jones was sentenced to three years of probation for the run-in with the police on Feb. 6, 2006, outside the family home of his pregnant girlfriend in Fayetteville, Ga.
